title: The Hidden Land
description: The five cousins are still trapped in the Secret Country, and must play their parts. When the King is poisoned, Ted-Prince Edward-must take the throne, even though he has no idea how to rule a country, battle magic, or inspire followers.Â  Soon enough he will have to do all three because the Country is on the verge of war with the treacherous Dragon King.
author: Pamela Dean
